ing: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - boiled
1 tart apple - peeled, cored and chopped
des: "Unique chicken salad perfect for a nice luncheon. Serve on toasted heavy grain bread, on croissants, or on a bed of lettuce for a very unique chicken salad."
ins: In a large bowl toss together the chicken, raisins, celery and grapes. Fold in the avocado and the apple. Mix in the mayonnaise and lemon juice. Chill.
